snippet.title: The Rogue Prince of Persia: Gameplay Trailer (New Release Date)
snippet.description:
The Rogue Prince of Persia will now release on May 27th into Steam Early Access, at 19.99$!

This trailer music is part of our theme song by the insanely talented @AsadiMusic, who has created the entire soundtrack, blending ancient Persian tones with modern rhythms!

Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2717880/The_Rogue_Prince_of_Persia
